responsibilities: Built and run an end-to-end operating model: applications → analysis → recruitment → routine-aware rostering (~15 hrs/week) → HR requisitions → digital punch-card (automated hours/pay) → utilization & performance analytics → weekly reports & coaching → end-of-term reporting
Established a central Discord for consultations, monthly ST meetings, targeted assignments for at-risk students, and multi-channel query handling (email/Discord/Slack)
Scale: routinely led a large ST workforce (peaks ~200), sustaining smooth support across CSE and MNS
